page.title: 06Home life Giggleswick Parish
page.content: My name is Rebecca Airey and I am 13 years old. I live at Beverley, Giggleswick and go to Settle Middle School. My sister, Nicola is 16 and attends Settle High School. The school day is from 8.30am to 3.15pm. I live 2 miles away so Mum takes me. At weekends I enjoy helping Dad on the farm and sometimes in the holidays I go to Gisburn Auction Mart. As a member of Lawkland Young Farmers Club we meet every Monday night. We have lots of different competitions, cake judging, bike handling and flower arranging. Sometimes on Sundays I go to the Pathfinder group at St. Alkeldas church in Giggleswick.
